ing: salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "This nice and fruity salsa has a kick. A slightly-underipe peach gives it a bit of crunch. Serve with corn chips or spoon onto hamburgers. Try vodka in place of the tequila for a different flavor."
ins: Toss together the canned peaches, fresh peach, onion, habanero pepper, and cilantro in a mixing bowl; stir. Pour the lime juice, tequila, and olive oil over the mixture and mix well. Season with salt and pepper. Cover; refrigerate overnight or 8 hours before serving.
